named-native-query.name: Tipos.findAll
named-native-query.query: select t.* from tab_tipo t where t.tipo_carro like :tipoCarro

named-native-query.name: Tipos.findById
named-native-query.query: select v.id,v.modelo,v.data_lancamento,v.preco,v.cor,m.nome from tab_veiculo v join tab_tipo t on t.id = v.tipo_id join tab_marca m on m.id = v.marca_id where t.id = :idTipo
